body:
In the new update when it came to Registering i got a bit confused so i thought just in case anyone els needs help i made this!
--------------------------------------------------->
1.Go to https://avicus.net/register <<Click the link!

2.Enter Your Minecraft Username into the 'MineCraft Username' bar, it can be your recent IGN as in before you changed it to a new one like i did. -And enter password!

3.Press 'Next Step' and it will give you an ip! Minimize Your browser and enter Minecaft 
/--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------4.Go into Minecraft and click Add server and Paste the ip you received!

 5.Then join the server and it will pop up with a messge like this>
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------6.You have done and your Avicus page should say success!
-If it doesnt work then talk to staff or email surport!

title: How to Register in Omega Update >
